document_data.caption: A map showing the Old Monster Shop on the Jar.
document_data.name: Old Monster Shop
document_data.mainbody: The '''Old Monster Shop''' was a business located in [[Waterdeep]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: The building was four stories tall.
document_data.Location: The Old Monster Shop was located in the eastern section of the [[Waterdeep/Southern Ward|Southern Ward]] on a small alley called [[the Jar]] just south of [[Tilman's Lane]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Volo 5297}}
document_data.Activities: The shop specialized in [[poison]]s and other extraordinary items.
